sentences.en: ‘I think he’s in for a surprise,’ Ian said, in a somewhat arch tone.
sentences.cn: “我想他很快就会感到惊讶的。”伊恩略带调侃地说道。

sentences.en: Both of them looked at him with that curious, slightly amused and even arch expression.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都看着他，带着一副好奇的、有点觉得好笑甚至是淘气的表情。

sentences.en: Dip your head under the low arch.
sentences.cn: 在低矮的门拱下要低头.

sentences.en: Don't arch your back, keep your spine straight.
sentences.cn: 别佝着背，把腰挺直。

sentences.en: Go through the arch and follow the path.
sentences.cn: 穿过拱门沿小径往前走。

sentences.en: He tried in a hundred ways to convey his own feelings , casting arch glances at them.
sentences.cn: 他乘机百般撩拨,眉目传情.

sentences.en: It seemed to take Sirius an age to fall: his body curved in a graceful arc as he sank backwards through the ragged veil hanging from the arch.
sentences.cn: 好像小天狼星摔倒用了很长时间；当他向后摔倒，通过了拱门上粗糙的帘子时，他的身体蜷成了一个优美的拱形。

sentences.en: Looking from a distance like a gigantic arch, it is a continuous loop, a kind of square doughnut.
sentences.cn: 从远处看像一座巨大的拱门，实际上它是一个连续的环，有点像方形面包圈。

sentences.en: Neither he nor his arch-rival, Giuseppe De Rita, won.
sentences.cn: 他和他的死对头朱塞佩·德里察双双落败。

sentences.en: The earliest European segmental arch bridge was built at Florence in 1345.
sentences.cn: 欧洲最早的拱桥是1345年在佛罗伦萨建成的.

sentences.en: The trees arch overhead.
sentences.cn: 树木在头顶上弯成拱形.

sentences.en: The triumphal arch commemorates Caesar's victory over Pompey.
sentences.cn: 凯旋门用于纪念恺撒击败庞培，得胜而归。

sentences.en: Their attempts to be casual have so far just looked arch or patronising.
sentences.cn: 他们本想做出漫不经心的样子，结果反而显得傲慢自大或自视甚高。

sentences.en: There was an inscription in Chinese characters over the arch.
sentences.cn: 牌楼上有汉字题字.

sentences.en: They walked through the arch and into the cobbled courtyard.
sentences.cn: 他们穿过拱门走进铺着鹅卵石的院子。

sentences.en: This huge triumphal arch was erected at the beginning of this century.
sentences.cn: 这座巨大的凯旋门是本世纪初建造的.

sentences.en: Traders in Marble Arch are facing huge rent increases.
sentences.cn: 大理石拱门的经销商们面临租金的大幅上涨。

sentences.en: Two rows of trees arched over the driveway.
sentences.cn: 车道两旁树木交错，形成一个拱顶。

sentences.en: We whomped our arch rival in the season's climactic football game.
sentences.cn: 我们在该季最精彩足球赛中打败了我们主要的对手.

sentences.en: When she passed under the arch leading out of the park, Mira whooped with delight.
sentences.cn: 从通向公园外的拱门下走过时，米拉高兴地喊叫起来。

words.tran_cn: 拱形的；有拱的；弓形结构的
狡猾地；顽皮地；主要地；淘气地
成弓形弯曲；成弓形（arch的过去分词形式）
成弓形弯曲；成弓形（arch的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 拱悬于之上；把拱盖起来
足弓垫；护弓具；拱形支架
大理石拱门（有名的伦敦标志）

trans.tran_cn: 神秘的，调皮的，傲慢自大的
trans.tran_en: amused because you think you understand something better than other people
a structure with a curved top and straight sides that supports the weight of a bridge or building
to form or make something form a curved shape
to form or make something form a curved shape
